HomePage.error: An error occurred. Please try again later.

CreateEvent.title: Title
CreateEvent.enterDescription: You can make part of the text larger, bold, centered, add a list, highlight, and more.
CreateEvent.rangeDateCheckbox: The event lasts more than 1 day
CreateEvent.uploadImages: Drag and drop images here or click to upload
CreateEvent.uploadImagesInfo: You can upload up to 10 images. Max size per image: 2MB. Allowed format: JPG, PNG, WEBP, GIF.
CreateEvent.maxImagesExceeded: You can upload up to 10 images. Only the first 10 will be kept.
CreateEvent.maxImageSizeExceeded: One or more images were larger than 2MB and were not uploaded.
CreateEvent.enterPrice: Enter price or price range (0 for free event)
CreateEvent.atLeastOneOrganizer: At least one organizer is required
CreateEvent.atLeastOneTag: Please select at least one tag
CreateEvent.endDateAfterStartDate: End date must be after start date
CreateEvent.endTimeAfterStartTime: End time must be after start time
CreateEvent.error: An error occurred. Please try again later.
CreateEvent.confirmDeleteEvent: Are you sure you want to delete this event? This action cannot be undone.
CreateEvent.unsavedChangesDescription: You have unsaved changes. Are you sure you want to leave this page?

Profile.personalInformationDescr: Update your personal information and contact details.
Profile.passwordLength: Password must be at least 6 characters long.
Profile.deleteAccountDescr: If you delete your account, it cannot be recovered.
Profile.deleteAccountIrreversibleWarning: Are you sure you want to delete your account? All events you have created will also be permanently deleted. This action cannot be undone.
Profile.resetEmail: If you registered using this email, you will receive a password reset email.
Profile.userAlreadyExists: User with this email already exists.
Profile.errorOccurred: An error occurred. Please try again later.
Profile.pleaseCheckEmail: Please check your email to confirm your registration.

General.eventCreatedSuccessfully: Event created successfully and is pending administrator approval.
General.cookiesDescr: We use cookies to make the site better. If you accept all cookies, you will be able to save events to favorites.
General.favoritesAvailability: To save an event as a favorite, please allow cookie storage in your browser.

NotFound.title: We couldn't find this page
NotFound.description: The page you are looking for might have been removed, had its name changed, or is temporarily unavailable.

WhyUs.headerTagline: all4ruse – your space for events in Ruse
WhyUs.aboutMe: I am the creator of this new Ruse website, Silvena, an optimist who believes that with enough desire we can make our city an even better place to live.
WhyUs.aboutMe2: I love Ruse, I love going to events, but I missed a neat place where I could see what's happening this week without scrolling through multiple Facebook pages.
WhyUs.whyCreated: Ruse is rich in cultural events – concerts, theaters, workshops, events for children, sports, community meetings, but the information about them is scattered across different Facebook pages and websites.
WhyUs.whyCreated2: I often find an interesting event only after it has passed. Other events probably I never knew it happened.
WhyUs.whyCreated3: My goal is to gather the most interesting things happening in Ruse and the surrounding area in one place and make it easy to find.
WhyUs.whatMakesDifferent: Facebook is good, but it is not designed for an organized calendar. Here you have:
WhyUs.searchAndFiltersDesc: Search by keyword, dates, and topics (theater, workshops, children, etc.)
WhyUs.cleanInterfaceDesc: No ads and unnecessary noise, focus only on Ruse and the region
WhyUs.howEventsAreAdded: Events are uploaded by an administrator or by organizers after registering on the site.
WhyUs.howEventsAreAdded2: Each event goes through approval by an administrator before being published.
WhyUs.howEventsAreAdded3: Illegal, misleading, gambling, or advertising events are not published.
WhyUs.howEventsAreAdded4: If you see something that you think is not okay, you can always write to me and I will check it.
WhyUs.sendEventDesc: Even if you are not an organizer, you can share important events.
WhyUs.reportIssueDesc: Help keep the information up-to-date and accurate.
WhyUs.newIdeasDesc: Tags, filters, and features that would be useful to you.
WhyUs.yourFeedbackMatters: Every message to me with your opinion helps this site become better.
WhyUs.contactInfo: If you want to suggest a new idea, give criticism, or just say “Hi, I like what you are doing,” you can write to me at:
WhyUs.lookingForwardToHearingFromYou: I look forward to hearing what you would like to see more of in Ruse – both on the site and in the city.
